title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Design and Operational Strategies for Remote Education Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least two effective time management strategies in remote learning environments
Learners can apply principles of instructional design using mixed research methods to real-world cases
Learners can practice communication techniques to enhance learner engagement in small-scale online classes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
